author: S Vijay Kumar
text:
Gandhiya Makkal Iyakkam led by Tamilaruvi Manian has decided to work with the newly launched Abdul Kalam Vision India Party (AVIP).

Abdul Kalam was a true Gandhian who followed simplicity and honesty all through this life. A new alliance would be launched in Chennai soon, Mr. Manian told The Hindu .

The objective was to provide a credible alternative force in the State where the people were fed up with the style of politics of the two major Dravidian parties.

“The people are longing for a change,” he said.
title: Gandhian forum to join hands with AVIP
